title: 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner, 10ft Rustic Sheer Runner Gauze Tablecloth Boho Wedding Decor Romantic Table Runner for Wedding Bridal Shower Birthday Party(35" x 118") (Terracotta)
descriptions:
### Boho Chic 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runners â€“ Terracotta | Rustic Sheer Runners for Weddings & More

Elevate your event decor with our stunning 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runners in Terracotta! Each runner is crafted from high-quality polyester, offering a soft, comfortable, and durable texture that complements any rustic or boho wedding, bridal shower, or birthday party setting.

#### **Why Choose Our Table Runners?**

- **High-Quality Polyester:** Enjoy the beautiful terracotta color and soft, comfortable feel. Our runners are not only easy on the eyes but also easy on the skin.
- **Durable & Lightweight:** Made with a blend of durability and lightness, these runners are perfect for both indoor and outdoor events. No need to worry about wear and tear!
- **Versatile & Multi-Purpose:** One size fits most tables, making them incredibly versatile for weddings, holiday parties, birthday celebrations, and even in restaurants and hotels. Use them as chair cover sashes, decorative napkins, or for gift wrapping.
- **Easy to Store & Carry:** With 12 pieces in each pack, these runners are conveniently portable and easy to store. Perfect for last-minute setups or to have on hand for any occasion.

#### **Care Instructions:**
- **Hand Wash or Machine Wash:** For best results, hand wash or machine wash in cold water using mild detergent. Avoid using hot water and do not iron.
- **Gentle Cycles:** If using a machine, select a gentle cycle to ensure your runners stay in top condition.
- **Reusability:** These runners are reusable, making them a cost-effective and eco-friendly choice.

#### **Customer Support:**
- **Free Customer Support:** Have any questions? Our dedicated team is here to help. Contact us for any inquiries or concerns.

#### **Applications & Use:**
- **Wedding Parties:** Transform your reception with these elegant runners that add a touch of romance and bohemia to your decor.
- **Bridal Showers:** Perfect for any bridal shower, these runners will match any theme and make the space feel warm and inviting.
- **Birthday Parties:** Celebrate in style with these versatile and beautiful runners that will make your party unforgettable.
- **Restaurants & Hotels:** Add a touch of sophistication to any dining table with these rustic runners that will elevate your space.
- **Chair Cover Sashes:** Use them to tie chairs together or as individual sashes, adding a unique and personal touch.
- **Decorative Napkins:** Fold and place these runners under your plates for a charming and boho look.
- **Gift Wrapping:** Give your gifts an elegant touch with these beautiful and soft runners.

#### **Packaging Contents:**
- **12 Pieces:** Each pack includes 12 terracotta cheesecloth table runners, each measuring 35 inches wide by 118 inches long.

Transform your next event into a memorable celebration with our 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runners. Order now and bring a touch of rustic elegance to your next gathering!
